findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables can be declared as constant.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The code doesn't follow the Solidity style guide for naming conventions.
findings.location: Multiple locations in the ArabianHorse.sol contract

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Events are not properly logged and triggered in the contract.

findings.title: L12 - Using Variables before Declaration
findings.description: Variables are used before they are declared, which can lead to errors.
findings.location: Multiple locations in the ArabianHorse.sol contract

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: Local variables are not initialized before use, which can cause errors.
findings.location: Multiple locations in the ArabianHorse.sol contract

findings.title: L20 - Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: Transfer methods don't properly check for success, which can lead to assumptions about transfer status.
